SEARCH

Interface IOHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
CsvHandler
public interface IOHandler
Interface representing an IOHandler for CSV file operations. Provides methods for reading, writing, and updating CSV data.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addPatient(String[] patientDetails)
    Adds a new patient record to the CSV.
    void
    addRow(String[] rowDetails)
    Adds a new row to the CSV file.
    void
    addStaff(String[] staffDetails)
    Adds a new staff record to the CSV.
    String
    getField(int columnToSearch, String valueToFindRow, int columnToGet)
    Retrieves a specific field value from the CSV.
    String[]
    getHeaders()
    Retrieves the headers of the CSV file.
    List<String[]>
    getRows(int columnToSearch, String valueToFind)
    Retrieves rows from the CSV where a specific column matches a given value.
    Map<String,String[]>
    readCsv()
    Reads the CSV file and loads its data into memory.
    Collection<String[]>
    readCsvValues()
    Reads the values of the CSV file excluding headers.

    removeRows(int columnToSearch, String valueToFind)
    Removes rows from the CSV where a specific column matches a given value.

    Updates the in-memory CSV data and saves it back to the file.

    Updates a row in the CSV where a specific column matches a given value.

  • Method Details

    • getHeaders

      String[] getHeaders()
      Retrieves the headers of the CSV file.
      Returns:
      An array of strings representing the headers of the CSV file.

    • readCsv

      Map<String,String[]> readCsv()
      Reads the CSV file and loads its data into memory.
      Returns:
      A map where the key is the unique identifier and the value is an array of row data.

    • updateCsv

      void updateCsv(Map<String,String[]> newData) throws IOException
      Updates the in-memory CSV data and saves it back to the file.
      Parameters:
      newData - A map containing the updated data to save.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while saving the file.

    • getRows

      List<String[]> getRows(int columnToSearch, String valueToFind)
      Retrieves rows from the CSV where a specific column matches a given value.
      Parameters:
      columnToSearch - The index of the column to search.
      valueToFind - The value to search for in the specified column.
      Returns:
      A list of rows matching the specified value in the given column.

    • getField

      String getField(int columnToSearch, String valueToFindRow, int columnToGet)
      Retrieves a specific field value from the CSV.
      Parameters:
      columnToSearch - The index of the column to search.
      valueToFindRow - The value to identify the row.
      columnToGet - The index of the column to retrieve the value from.
      Returns:
      The value in the specified column for the matching row.

    • setField

      void setField(int columnToSearch, String valueToFindRow, int columnToChange, String newValue) throws IOException
      Sets a specific field value in the CSV.
      Parameters:
      columnToSearch - The index of the column to search.
      valueToFindRow - The value to identify the row.
      columnToChange - The index of the column to update.
      newValue - The new value to set.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while saving the updated file.

    • addPatient

      void addPatient(String[] patientDetails) throws IOException
      Adds a new patient record to the CSV.
      Parameters:
      patientDetails - An array of strings representing the patient's details.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while adding the new record.

    • addStaff

      void addStaff(String[] staffDetails) throws IOException
      Adds a new staff record to the CSV.
      Parameters:
      staffDetails - An array of strings representing the staff's details.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while adding the new record.

    • readCsvValues

      Collection<String[]> readCsvValues()
      Reads the values of the CSV file excluding headers.
      Returns:
      A collection of arrays where each array represents a row in the CSV file.

    • addRow

      void addRow(String[] rowDetails) throws IOException
      Adds a new row to the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      rowDetails - An array of strings representing the row details.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while adding the row.

    • updateRow

      void updateRow(int columnToSearch, String valueToFind, String[] rowData) throws IOException
      Updates a row in the CSV where a specific column matches a given value.
      Parameters:
      columnToSearch - The index of the column to search.
      valueToFind - The value to identify the row.
      rowData - An array of strings representing the updated row data.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while updating the row.

    • removeRows

      void removeRows(int columnToSearch, String valueToFind) throws IOException
      Removes rows from the CSV where a specific column matches a given value.
      Parameters:
      columnToSearch - The index of the column to search.
      valueToFind - The value to identify rows to remove.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while removing the rows.
